name: searchForSecondResultAndOpen
description:
- Open Google Chrome
- Navigate to [https://www.google.com/ncr]
- Search for [Cucumber IO]
- Navigate to the second results page
- Assert that the link of the second result contains [https://www.linkedin.com]

• Open Google Chrome

  • Navigate to the second results page
  • Assert that the link of the second result contains [https://www.linkedin.com]
